lead_paragraph: The Olympic flame that will burn in Rio in August for the first Games in South America was handed over to Brazil on Wednesday in the marble stadium that hosted the first modern Games in 1896.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Receives Olympic Flame for Rio Games
headline.main: Brazil Receives Olympic Flame for Rio Games

snippet: The Olympic flame that will burn in Rio in August for the first Games in South America was handed over to Brazil on Wednesday in the marble stadium that hosted the first modern Games in 1896....
